website_summaries.verdict: The Fujifilm X-E3 delivers excellent image quality in a slim body, making it a perfect option for photographers who like to pack light—as long as you pair it with the right lens.

customer_reviews.title: Fujifilm x-e3
customer_reviews.text: If you like the style then you will love it for its compactness and solid classy feel the only thing I just wish it had a flip up tilting screen like almost every other camera in this class and price range and I know you can get the xt20/xt30 if you want a Fujifilm with a tilting screen but there not the rangefinder style I like. There really is nothing bad about this camera the handling the focus speed and picture quality are all fine. For me it’s standout feature is it just makes me want to pick it up and get out to take photos
customer_reviews.author: W. N. Legge

customer_reviews.title: Superb little camera and lens
customer_reviews.text: A cracking camera - small and light with superb results - the 15-45 PZ lens is also excellent and gives very sharp images. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: aroma

customer_reviews.title: Great handy camera
customer_reviews.text: Already got a Fujifilm X-PRO2 and wanted a second body. Great picture quality and uses a second lens I don’t need to keep swapping. Good for street photography. I have used the WiFi with this which is useful. A compact camera which is lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Hyman

customer_reviews.title: Fuji X-E3, perfect do-it-all digital camera.
customer_reviews.text: I've used several different camera systems over the past 60 years but have ended up favouring Fuji. Beside the new X-E3 I have the X-E1 and XT2. Fuji's 'film' options are outstanding and the top-plate manual controls superb. The X-E3 has everything you could wish for in a digital camera. Paired with Fujinon lenses it is small, light, unobtrusive and extremely versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Peter H

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality and super kit lens. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful small camera
customer_reviews.text: I have both the XT2 and now the XE3 - this camera is a perfect travel companion! Excellent picture quality and the ability to chance lenses is really useful as you can go totally anonymous "tourist style" or mount any large professional large lens according to your intention of use. The viewfinder is a bit small when using glasses - but not a huge problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kim R

customer_reviews.title: One of the best
customer_reviews.text: The second of this model for my collection, super quality photos and a pleasure to use.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hill

customer_reviews.title: Good value camera
customer_reviews.text: good alternative to using the phone and gives a real chance to develop more creative skills. Still exploring all the features of this camera.
customer_reviews.author: r p jolly

customer_reviews.title: great camera, shame about the manual disc being that ...
customer_reviews.text: great camera , shame about the manual disc being that for a 100F and not the E3
customer_reviews.author: Del

customer_reviews.title: X-E3 with the 18-55
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful camera, I particularly like the screen and dongle operation. The sighter viewfinder is also nice. Much prefer it to the bulkier xt-2 which I've also had. The thumb support works well. I've used it with the 18-55 (see photos) and the 35 f2. Both feel great on it.
customer_reviews.author: John Harrison

product_meta.title: Fujifilm X-E3 Mirrorless Digital Camera, Silver
product_meta.description:
Size Name:Body Only| Colour Name:SilverThe FUJIFILM X-E3 is a rangefinder style, ultra-compact mirror less camera which boasts outstanding image quality and enhanced handling. Utilising the X-Processor pro for best in class colour reproduction in both stills and 4K movies, it’s made for photographers who want to seamlessly upload photos directly to their smartphone or in tablet. Wireless function: Geotagging, Wireless communication [Image transfer], View & Obtain Images, Remote camera shooting, PC Autosave, instax printer print, Pairing registration, Delete pairing registration, Bluetooth ON/OFF Setting, Auto image transfer

BOX CONTAINS
X-E3 Silver, Li-ion battery NP-W126S, Battery charger BC-W126, Body cap, Shoe-mount flash unit EF-X8, Shoulder strap, Metal strap clip, Protective cover, Clip attaching tool, Owner's manual
feature_bullets: 24.3 MP X-Trans CMOS III APS-C sensor and the X-Processor Pro high-speed image processing engine
High resolution and high definition 4K video recording
Enhanced connectivity with bluetooth wireless communication
Compact and lightweight body for portability and practicality
X-E3 black, Li-ion battery NP-W126S, battery charger BC-W126, body cap, shoe-mount flash unit EF-X8, shoulder strap, metal strap clip, protective cover, clip attaching tool, owners' manual

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK
